description: Certain subgraphs of a directed graph (binomial transform of A005321).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: E. Andresen, K. Kjeldsen, On certain subgraphs of a complete transitively directed graph, Discrete Math. 14 (1976), no. 2, 103-119.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
